com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block

Class CreeperHanging

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block.CreeperHanging
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Replaceable

    public abstract class CreeperHanging
extends java.lang.Object
implements Replaceable
    Represents a hanging, i.e. either a painting or an ItemFrame.
    Author:
    nitnelave
